mapper.select: select user_nickname, user_comment , user_date, tf.field_name from tbl_user tu join tbl_gosu tg join tbl_gosu_field tgf join tbl_field tf on tu.user_number = tg.user_number and tg.gosu_number = tgf.gosu_number and tgf.field_number = tf.field_number where grade_number = "500" order by user_date ASC
